content: the dimensions and amount of yarn are indicative based on data from pattern tests if you have any questions or would like to see shawls made by others visit our fb group sishomemade pattern group 2 you can follow us on ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/sishomemade instagram https //www instagram com/sishomemd pinterest https //pl pinterest com/antomasiak/sishomemade facebook https //www facebook com/sishomemd facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/sishomemadepatterngroup we would also like to inform that after sending the file in accordance with article 38 of the act on consumer rights it is not possible to return the purchased file enjoy your crocheting 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sishomemadepatterngroup 2 https //www facebook com/groups/sishomemadepatterngroup
